review_data.title: Jedem zu emfehlen
review_data.content: Super frische Shawarma. Sehr lecker. Multikulti und freundliche Bedienung. Kann ich jedem empfehlen. Es hat Vegi und Fleischgerichte.

review_data.title: Bestes Shawarma

review_data.title: My New Favorite Place!!!
review_data.content: I went yesterday for the first time. Used to live in Zuerich and never knew about it, what a shame. I loved their sandwich so much that I went back already today for another one. It is a small take out. The owner is always...More

review_data.title: Lecker 😋
review_data.content: Die Atmosphäre die eines Imbisses aber großartiges Essen zu moderaten Preisen. Würde jederzeit wieder dort essen.

review_data.title: Best sandwiches in Zürich!
review_data.content: When I discovered this place a few years ago, it quickly became a regular part of my weekly routine. Tuesday evenings I have choir rehearsal in the neighborhood, so I make it a point to pass by Lebanese Takeaway for a shawarma or falafel on...More

review_data.title: Good option
review_data.content: The food was good, the shawarma tasted very good. The waiters are kind although it was very busy. The place is a bit difficult to find

review_data.title: Falafel Heaven

review_data.title: Best Shawarma in Town
review_data.content: This small Lebanese take away, produces the best shawarma in Zurich. It’s a very small shop, and does not look so nice. But the food, specially the shawarma is the best you can get.

review_data.title: Great food and people
review_data.content: The meal was very good and the two owners were friendly. Had a good discussion on traveling through Europe. Would recommend if you are in the area.

review_data.title: Amazing food. Halal!
review_data.content: By far, my favorite Resturant in Zurich. Been going here for 2 years every week. Excellent price-to-quality ratio. Halal food. Amazing option for meat lovers.

review_data.title: Lecker Shawarma
review_data.content: Sollte man unbedingt probieren. Einfacher, kleiner unscheinbarer Laden aber sehr lecker und authentisch

review_data.title: Great food, friendly staff
review_data.content: Great varieties of Lebanese food, super-friendly staff, definitely an excellent option for a quick eat near Schaffhauserplatz

review_data.title: Sandwich

review_data.title: Good Food

review_data.title: Amazing take away
review_data.content: Great Lebanese Take Away with a very friendly service and staff, good location even if you are in downtown Zurich, they are making a great effort, loving it

review_data.title: The best
review_data.content: I live nearby & have eaten there a lot. It's always been Incredibly delicous. Never met anybody who didn't like this place.

review_data.title: Best for Take a Way Arabic Food
review_data.content: We stopped at "Lebanese Takeaway" for take away Dinner. We ordered Falafel, Homus and burger-fufta sandwiches. This comes with Arabic food, which was fresh even though it is brought fro Stuttgart as written on the plastic bag. The Falafel Sandwich was big enough for one...More

review_data.title: best libanes in zh city
review_data.content: freshly prepared before your eyes, delicious choices and funny/lovely staff. ALWAYS great, every single time. never has disapointed me, so definetly worth it aaaand its cheap too!! enjoy!

review_data.title: Best lebanese in town

review_data.title: Little Space but Very Fast Food
review_data.content: Great Hummus, and Sandwiches. Haven't had much else yet but the taste was excellent. The owner was extremely friendly and talkative. The place has an interesting atmosphere and is being visited by many what I assume are expats or migrants from Lebanon. The space inside...More

review_data.title: The best falafel in town
review_data.content: Amazing lebanese take-out food. Every item they have on their menue is awesome. They prepare everything french and very authentic. Love it!

review_data.title: Delicious shawarma
review_data.content: Simply the best Takeaway in Zurich. You must try the suguk, falafel or chicken spit shawarma. The price of 8 CHF (or 12 CHF including a drink) is very reasonable for the best shawarma you'll ever eat.
